abstract: Do you think they should be allowed to change their role in the royal family? What do you think about the reaction from Buckingham Palace?
lead_paragraph: Do you typically follow what happens in the British royal family? What have you read, watched or heard about Prince Harry and Meghan, also known as the Duke and Duchess of Sussex? What is your initial reaction to the news of their announcement that they will be “stepping back” from their official duties? What questions about it do you have?
